Table	Create Table
reports	CREATE TABLE `reports` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `suspectName` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `location` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text NOT NULL,
  `attachments` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','reviewing','approved','rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `reviewNote` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `reporterIp` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=120001
